title: mzPeak metadata software list
description: Describe the JSON format of software list

software.description: A piece of software. Analogous to https://peptideatlas.org/tmp/mzML1.1.0.html#software.

id.description: A unique identifier for this software, even amongst different versions of the same software.

parameters.description: Additional parameters describing this software, such as its controlled vocabulary identifier, or the term MS:1000799 for custom unreleased software to denote its name.
